se.swedenconnect.opensaml.sweid.saml2.signservice.sap.SADVersion

  • Packages that use SADVersion 
    Package Description
    se.swedenconnect.opensaml.sweid.saml2.signservice
    SAML support for Signature Services according to the Swedish eID Framework.
    se.swedenconnect.opensaml.sweid.saml2.signservice.build
    Builders for Sign service classes.
    se.swedenconnect.opensaml.sweid.saml2.signservice.sap
    Classes and interfaces implementing the Signature Activation Protocol for Federated Signing specification.
    se.swedenconnect.opensaml.sweid.saml2.signservice.sap.impl
    Implementation classes, builders, marshallers and unmarshallers for the SAD/SAP support.
